backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the workout scheduling app's backend with types for workouts, user profiles, and a 22-tier progression system, plus CRUD APIs for workout schedules, motivational messages, and user profiles with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the notification interval in `frontend/public/sw.js` was changed from 6 hours to 4 hours, with high confidence and linked to test REQ-17.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, page, hook, and utility in the Daily Grind app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Daily Grind PWA, linking the manifest, setting PWA meta tags for iOS and Android, and mounting the React app via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Daily Grind defining the app name, standalone display mode, theme/background colors, and a 256x256 icon for home screen installation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service Worker that schedules periodic workout reminder notifications every 4 hours using setInterval, displays random motivational quotes, and handles START/STOP/TEST messages plus notification click events to focus or open the app window.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router app setup with five routes (index, today, schedule, progress, settings) wrapped in a `RootLayout` component that applies ThemeProvider, AppLayout, and registers the service worker on mount.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: App shell component rendering a sticky header with logo, desktop nav links, and login button, a mobile bottom nav bar, and a main content area with a branded footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Wraps children with authentication and profile checks, showing a loading spinner, login screen, or profile setup modal as appropriate before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, and loading states with appropriate icons.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays the app's landing/login page with branding, a feature list, and a login button for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time users to set a display name and notification preference, saving the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/TierBadge.tsx: Defines 22 ranked tiers with associated styles and renders a styled badge component in compact or full variants based on a given tier.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and hook for managing authentication state, login, and logout using the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages browser notification permissions and scheduling, syncing enabled state with the backend user profile and exposing enable/disable/test actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including workout schedules (CRUD, mark complete), motivational messages, user profile, and tier system operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme color tokens plus utility classes for glow shadows and success colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Progress.tsx: Progress page displaying weekly workout stats (streak, completion percentage, day-by-day grid) derived from workout schedules, with tier badge and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/Schedule.tsx: Schedule page showing a per-day workout card list with inline create/edit/delete forms and today highlighting, backed by workout schedule query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page for managing tier progression evaluation and browser push notification preferences, displaying current tier info and weekly completion progress.
frontend/src/pages/TodaysWorkout.tsx: React page that displays the current day's workout from the user's schedule, shows a motivational message banner, and provides a toggle button to mark the workout as completed.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Utility module for managing browser push notifications via a service worker, including registration, permission requests, and sending messages to start/stop notification schedules or trigger test notifications.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with helpers for persisting values to sessionStorage and cleaning sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH-based color tokens, extended typography/border/shadow scales, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the 'Daily Grind' workout reminder app's architecture, existing features, known issues, and versioning metadata for build planning.
